parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The provided post does not contain a CMF number. While the absence of a CMF number is not automatically disqualifying, it suggests the post may not be directly linked to official electoral campaign materials.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions "\u0218tefan C\u00eempan - candidat Camera Deputa\u021bilor la alegerile Parlamentare". This clearly identifies a parliamentary candidate.  Therefore, Article 36 (7) - a applies.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, targeting a wide audience within specified geographical areas (Suceava County and several cities within).  The hashtags further suggest an attempt to reach a broad audience interested in the parliamentary elections. Therefore, it addresses the wide population.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The explicit mention of \u0218tefan C\u00eempan as a parliamentary candidate, coupled with the use of relevant hashtags (#Alegeri2024, #AlegeriParlamentare), strongly suggests the objective is to promote his candidacy and influence voters.  The paid nature of the post reinforces this intention. Therefore, Article 36 (7) - c applies.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic content. It lacks the characteristics of objective reporting, analysis, or opinion pieces. Instead, it directly promotes a candidate, lacking the neutrality expected from journalistic work.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a promotional piece for a political candidate.  The use of paid advertising further solidifies this conclusion.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>559325903408021</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers directly to a parliamentary candidate (\u0218tefan C\u00eempan), is used during the electoral campaign period (as indicated by the end date), has a clear electoral objective (promoting the candidate), and is targeted at a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement.  The absence of a CMF number is not sufficient to negate these factors.  The post's content and context strongly suggest an intention to influence the vote in favor of the candidate.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>\u0218tefan C\u00eempan</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>REPER</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
REPER Suceava, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei reclame plătite pe Facebook (ID postare: 559325903408021) care promovează candidatura lui \u0218tefan C\u00eempan la alegerile parlamentare, având un efect electoral clar prin promovarea directă a candidatului și îndemnul implicit la vot, fapt ce constituie propagandă electorală interzisă după încheierea perioadei legale de campanie.  Postarea, prin conținutul său explicit ("Ștefan Cîmpean - candidat Camera Deputaților la alegerile Parlamentare") și utilizarea hashtag-urilor relevante (#Alegeri2024, #AlegeriParlamentare), îndeplinește toate criteriile propagandei electorale conform articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, fiind adresată unui public larg prin intermediul unei reclame plătite pe o platformă publică. Absența unui număr CMF nu exonerează de răspundere.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
